Sentencas: A post-experimental analysis of a SOFC stack is presented.
Titulo: Post-experimental analysis of a solid oxide fuel cell stack using hybrid seals

Sentencas: The stack was operated for 1800 h at 700 degrees C with air and hydrogen and contained hybrid glass-Thermiculite 866 seals.
Titulo: Post-experimental analysis of a solid oxide fuel cell stack using hybrid seals

Sentencas: The goal of this work was to investigate the sealing microstructure and possible corrosion during mid-term operation.
Titulo: Post-experimental analysis of a solid oxide fuel cell stack using hybrid seals

Sentencas: It was found that hybrid seals could effectively compensate for manufacturing tolerances of cells and other components due to the compliance of the glass layer.
Titulo: Post-experimental analysis of a solid oxide fuel cell stack using hybrid seals

Sentencas: Additionally, different interfaces were investigated for corrosion.
Titulo: Post-experimental analysis of a solid oxide fuel cell stack using hybrid seals

Sentencas: Corrosion was not observed at two-phase interfaces such as Crofer 22 APU/glass, glass/electrolyte and glass/Thermiculite 866.
Titulo: Post-experimental analysis of a solid oxide fuel cell stack using hybrid seals

Sentencas: The three-phase interface between Crofer 22 APU/glass/hydrogen exhibited no corrosion.
Titulo: Post-experimental analysis of a solid oxide fuel cell stack using hybrid seals

Sentencas: Some evidence of non-systematic corrosion was found at the Crofer 22 APU/glass/air interface.
Titulo: Post-experimental analysis of a solid oxide fuel cell stack using hybrid seals

Sentencas: The possible reasons for the corrosion are discussed.
Titulo: Post-experimental analysis of a solid oxide fuel cell stack using hybrid seals

Sentencas: Lastly, dual exposure to humid hydrogen and air of the 0.2 mm Crofer 22 APU interconnect had no detrimental effect on the corrosion compared to air exposure.
Titulo: Post-experimental analysis of a solid oxide fuel cell stack using hybrid seals

Sentencas: Overall the hybrid seals used in combination with the thin interconnects were found to be a promising solution due to the low leak rate and limited material interactions.
Titulo: Post-experimental analysis of a solid oxide fuel cell stack using hybrid seals
Post-experimental analysis of a solid oxide fuel cell stack using hybrid seals
